author: Cortex XSOAR

automation.description: Deprecated. Use playbook filters instead. Verifies path in context - Verifies path existence - If matching object is an array - verify fields exists in each of the objects in the array - If matching object is not an array - verify fields exists in matching object - if 'expectedValue' is given - ensure that the given value is equal to the context path
automation.name: VerifyContext

automation.description: Deprecated. No available replacement. Checks whether substring is within string. Returns - yes - string contains substring. no - string does not contain substring. If stringSeperator is provided, the substring will be split using the separator, and each item will be checked. If one of the items will be found in the string, the srcipt will return yes. This script is deprecated. The StringContainsArray filter implements the exact functionality.
automation.name: StringContains

automation.description: Verify given entry contains a string
automation.name: VerifyHumanReadableContains

automation.description: Use rakyll/hey to test a web application with a load of requests.
automation.name: Hey

automation.description: Verifies that a given object includes all the given fields.
automation.name: VerifyObjectFieldsList

automation.description: Returns, whether there're, are enough indicators in the system.
automation.name: VerifyEnoughIndicators

automation.description: Deprecated. No available replacement. Sets key/value pair in incident's context.
automation.name: SetContext

automation.description: Check whether a given query returns enough incidents.
automation.name: VerifyEnoughIncidents

automation.description: Wait and complete tasks by given status. Used for test playbooks.
automation.name: WaitAndCompleteTask

automation.description: Deprecated. No available replacement. While loop is utility script, to do while loops on specific commands or scripts, it will allow you to loop over until some condition is fulfilled (${keyToWatch} == value). Please make sure timeout of the script also sufficient for the loop.
automation.name: WhileLoop

automation.description: Checks for existing errors in a given integration.
automation.name: VerifyIntegrationHealth

automation.description: Deprecated. Use playbook filters instead. Verify fields are in context.

automation.description: Given an integration name, returns the instance name.

automation.description: Execute FetchIncident for a given instance
automation.name: FetchFromInstance

automation.description: Find the differences between two indicators lists.
automation.name: CompareIndicators

name: Developer Tools
readme:
## Developer Tools Pack
Basic tools for content development, mostly for internal use.
